---
Suites: IDAA
Test
---
!3 Purpose
The fixture drops a database table that was previously created with the ..FrontPage.ExamplesJac.TestJac.TryOutDatabaseStuff.TryOutIdaaOnlyTable.CreateTable fixture.

!3 Limitations
By design, the drop table is only able to drop tables created by ..FrontPage.ExamplesJac.TestJac.TryOutDatabaseStuff.TryOutIdaaOnlyTable.CreateTable


|script      |drop table    |drptab                                             |
|ignore error|Yes                                                               |
|ensure      |table         |${demotab}|does not exist in database|${dbconnection}|
|show        |table name for|${demotab}                                       |
|check       |error message |No errors                                          |

!lastmodified
